maxwell

Class AuctionAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • maxwell.AuctionAPI

  • public class AuctionAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    AuctionAPI is a simple auction system that provides access to items (AuctionItem) and bids (Bid).
    Author:
    Steven Vuong

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuctionAPI

        public AuctionAPI(java.lang.String clientID,
                  java.lang.String clientSecret)
        Constructor. Would have to implement a real identification system. For now it just accepts everything.
        Parameters:
        clientID - User's username
        clientSecret - User's password A user may or may not have access to an Auction item based on this authentication.

      • addItem

        public boolean addItem(java.lang.String itemName,
                       double reservedPrice)
        Adds an item to be auctioned.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Unique item name for the auctioned item.
        reservedPrice - The reserved price for the item.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the add was successful. Otherwise false.

      • startAuction

        public boolean startAuction(java.lang.String itemName)
        Starts auction on an item.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Item name to start the auction on
        Returns:
        Returns true if successful. Returns false if item is already being auctioned, has finished auctioning, does not exist, or the client does not have permission to start it.

      • stopAuction

        public boolean stopAuction(java.lang.String itemName)
        Stops auction on an item.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Item name to stop the auction on
        Returns:
        Returns true if successful. Returns false if item is not being auctioned, already finished auctioning, does not exist, or the client does not have permission to start it.

      • bidOnItem

        public boolean bidOnItem(java.lang.String itemName,
                         double bidAmount)
        Bid on an item.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Item name to bid on
        bidAmount - The amount of the bid
        Returns:
        Returns true if successful in bidding.

      • isBeingAuctioned

        public boolean isBeingAuctioned(java.lang.String itemName)
        Check whether an item is being auctioned.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Item name being checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if item is being auctioned.

      • isFinishedAuctioning

        public boolean isFinishedAuctioning(java.lang.String itemName)
        Check whether an item has finished auctioning.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Item name being checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if item has finished auctioning.

      • isAuctionSuccessful

        public boolean isAuctionSuccessful(java.lang.String itemName)
        Check whether an item successfully auctioned (reserved price met).
        Parameters:
        itemName - Item name being checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if item's reserve price was met.

      • latestAction

        public static void latestAction(java.lang.String itemName)
        Query latest action on the item. Prints the information about the status of the item including whether it is being auctioned, whether it has been sold, the sold amount, and who it was sold to.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Item name being checked
